name: Knight's Quest (JoseAsmarDEV)
description:
Play as a brave knight on his journey to defeat the mad wizard! Will you succeed where others have failed?

This game was made with free assets found on Itch and Freesounds. 

Credits to: makofox, matrixxx, jerimee, plasterbrain, leongameryt, brullov_art, szadi art, elthen, poloviiinkin, luizmelo, sventhole, and jan-schneider.

Game by: Jose Asmar
